column1: NOTE: Play times are estimates. If we are ahead of schedule, the next game is allowed to start earlier than its scheduled time!
Pool play - Random teams, games to 21, win by 2. Each pod plays 4 sets.

column10: Bracket play based on pool play seeds
column20: Team 8 will sit twice in a row; they may use this time to practice
column25: Few teams will have to play with others twice. Occurs for teams 2, 5, 6, and 10.

column1: Bracket play - Set teams, games to 21, win by 2
column20: Team 9 will have a longer break than others since they sit twice at the very end
column25: Some teams never play with or against each other. Occurs for teams 1 and 5 for example.

column20: Team 11 will be the HOST pod, reffing every time they sit
column25: This was a necessity in order to balance the sit-play-ref schedule for each team.

column20: Last game will need a volunteer pod to ref
column25: Pods that play together more than once are more likely to have the same score differentials to determine seeding, meaning they are less likely to play on a team in bracket play.
